title: Pes Verdes - Casa de Cha
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, European
description: A tea house situated in a restored old tavern which has remained the traditional style. Visitors can enjoy organic teas, herbal teas, coffees and natural fruit juices, as well as the exclusive sale of vegan food in a warm and quiet atmosphere. No television and lounge music/ambient. Has themed tour guides of nature and a bookstore. No Wi-Fi.
streetAddress: Rua Direita da Igreja, 4, Sao Roque
